A rumor of warres among the times and signes of peace A sermon preached at Hamsted, in Middlesex, the 6. of September 1608. By William Bailey. Bailey, William, of Stapleford Abbat, Essex.
[58] p.
Printed by G. E[ld] for Ed: Blount, and William Barret, At London : [1608]
Printer's name and publication date from STC. Signatures: A-C D⁶ (-A1). Identified as STC 1201a on UMI microfilm. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
